alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Jefferson; Washington; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL WASHINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER...INDIANA...ALLEGHENY...SOUTHERN JEFFERSON...WESTMORELAND AND SOUTHERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Cameron to near McMurray. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Ross Township, McCandless Township, Monroeville, Moon Township, McMurray, Greensburg, McKeesport, and Indiana. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 41 and 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 30 and 99. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 47 and 78. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 90 and 97. Parkway North between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 50 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Jefferson; Washington; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
